onboardingDescription: This will show the welcome screen and tutorial again
featureDescription: With verbal buddy you can learn any part of linguistics in any language.
deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete category
pleaseSelectWordsLeft: Please, select the words from the list on the left.
greatYouGuessedAllWords: Great, you guessed all the words
needAtLeastThreeWords: You need at least 3 words with definitions to play this game.
areYouSureResetStats: Are you sure you want to reset stats?
reverseGuessModeDesc: In this mode, you will see a word and you need to explain its meaning.
speakClearly: Speak clearly and try to define the word as best as you can.
enableAiInSettings: Enable AI in settings to use this mode
aiCheckFailed: AI check failed, falling back to exact match
guessIntro: Guess the words by looking at their definitions! ðŸ”¥
guessIntroDesc: It trains your brain and helps you learn new words. ðŸ“š
guessInstructionAutoSubmit: You don't need to press Enter to check if the word is correct. If it is - it will be automatically submitted.
guessInstructionNoFormatting: For speed, you can type the word without spaces, dashes and capital letters. For example, "The Great Gatsby" can be typed as "thegreatgatsby".
guessInstructionStats: You'll see the stats on the right after you guess all the words. Avg. is the most important metric as it shows how much time you think between each word on average. Your goal is to improve it over time.
guessInstructionTimer: The timer counts only the time you spend thinking about the words, not the time you spend typing them. The red dot indicates that the timer is paused.
needAtLeastOneWord: You need at least 1 word to create jokes.
jokesExplanation: Jokes are a fun way to remember words. Create a joke by selecting words and see how they connect!
needThreeWords: You need at least 3 words and at least 1 category to create jokes.
areYouSureClearJournal: Are you sure you want to clear journal?
areYouSureDeleteEntry: Are you sure you want to delete
journalExplanation: Journal is a place where you can write your thoughts and ideas. Create a new entry and start writing!
startTypingWords: Start typing words you know ðŸ”¥
noWordsYet: No words yet. Add some! ðŸ”¥
deleteCategoryConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete category
randomWordsExplanation: Number of random words to select from the list to create random jokes.
speechRateExplanation: Speed of the voice pronunciation (0.5 to 2).
recognitionExplanation: Language to use for speech recognition.
useSpeechRecognitionExplanation: Whether to use speech recognition. If you have a microphone, you can use it to practice/guess words faster.
maxWordsGuessExplanation: Maximum number of words to play in Guess Games. Avoid practicing too many words at once if you're not ready.
pronounceDefinitionsExplanation: Pronounces definitions when new words are shown.
maxWordsPracticeExplanation: Maximum number of words to practice. Avoid practicing too many words at once if you're not ready.
delayToleranceExplanation: Stops the timer when you type for this amount of seconds so stats are not affected by typing pauses
languagePresetsDescription: Here you can quickly create a custom preset based on a language you want to learn.
voiceFeedbackExplanation: Whenever the word is entered correctly, the voice will say "correct" or "incorrect". When you guess all the words, the voice will say "finished"
startRightAwayExplanation: Starts the timer right away when you start a practice session if ON
countdownExplanation: Gives you a bit of time to prepare (in seconds)
presetsMainExplanation: Presets are a set of words and categories that you can apply to your current session. Resets all your stats.
aiTokenExplanation: Google AI API Token (Gemini). Required for AI features.
enterGoogleAiToken: Enter your Google AI API Token
